at the beginning of your upkeep each opponent draws a card
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card if you control a creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield otherwise put a plus n plus n counter on a creature you control
at the beginning of your upkeep choose one
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card for each shrine you control
at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice a creature
at the beginning of your upkeep mill two cards
at the beginning of your upkeep you may mill a card
at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a creature with power n or greater draw a card
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power
draw a card for each creature you control
